definitions.body: lit. father sf. [[אֲבוּ֫הִי]] Da 5:13 (v.Behrm Marti), [[אֲבוח]] (K:§ 53, 2 a) v:Da 5:11, v:Da 5:11, v:Da 5:11, v:Da 5:18 [[אֲבוּ֫הִי]] v:Da 5:2.
pl. fathers, ancestors , [[[אֲבָהָן]]D:l.c.], sf. [[אֲבָהָתי]] Da 2:33 (Baer [[תַי]]-, but v. K:§ 53, 1), [[אֲבָהָתָח]] Ezr 4:15, [[תָ֫נׇא]]- (Str. [[תַ֫נָא]]--) Ezr 5:12.
